job.title: AI/ML - Backend Software Engineer, Speech & Language Technologies
job.description: <br><strong>Summary<br></strong> <br>The AI/ML - Machine Translation team is looking for exceptional Software Engineers passionate about delighting customer’s experience and pushing the envelope on Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Embedded and Distributed Computing.<br><br> <br><strong>Key Qualifications<br></strong> <br>In-depth development experience with C/C++<br><br>Experience in object-oriented software design and programming<br><br>Experience in implementing services scalable to millions of users<br><br>Familiarity with networking, distributed systems and multi-threaded programming<br><br>Knowledge of machine learning techniques is a plus<br><br>Passionate about creating phenomenal products<br><br> <br><strong>Description<br></strong> <br>You will be a part of a team that is responsible for a wide variety of language technologies related research and development activities. You will primarily be responsible for developing services that deliver our applications and technologies to millions of people.<br><br><br>To succeed in this role, you are a strong programmer and a creative problem solver, who enjoys learning new things.<br><br><br>You will possess strong skills in object-oriented software design and programming. You are passionate about developing new features, maintaining existing code, fixing bugs, and contributing to overall system design. You are a great teammate who thrives in a dynamic environment with rapidly changing priorities.<br><br> <br><strong>Education &amp; Experience<br></strong> <br>B.S. or M.S. in Computer Science or related field with 4+ years of industrial working experience<br><br> <br>Role Number: 200200063<br><br>
